title: Wellness, Detox and Fitness Retreats in Colombia
description: Wellness, Detox and Fitness Retreats in Colombia
text:
In these retreats we recognize the value of strengthening the body and mind to connect with a healthy state of consciousness. We understand that life is about moving energy, and we need to awaken the ability to project and materialize the way of life that we dream of and deserve.
The intense work requires an effort that will be transformed into knowledge and a powerful state of stability. We train ourselves daily to face any situation that may arise in life. The WARRIOR is the one who works continuously to be attentive to the details of life, in this way he can see the path.
In these retreats we will work in 3 steps. The first is the DETOX phase. The second is the INTEGRATION phase. The third stage is STRENGTHENING. In this journey we integrate medicines and purification practices, training and a rhythm of life that inspires us to create our inner sustainability. This experience helps us to awaken the clarity to project our dream, our vision and life mission. We use these tools and experiences to sustain our journey in life. In these retreats we experience the possibility and potential for profound transformation.
This journey of Purification, Integration and Strengthening gives us the tools and inspiration to make our way in a creative and abundant way.
This 7-day retreat opens the door to a state of deep detoxification, cleansing toxins from the physical, emotional and mental body to experience a new state of conscious well-being.
This 30-day retreat is designed for people who want to deepen and intensify their life experience through immersive Calisthenics and Martial Arts training and enjoy delicious and nutritious food designed for this purpose.
In these 90 days we integrate all aspects of the retreats, DETOX and WARRIOR, for a complete tour of physical, mental and energetic conditioning. This journey inspires us and gives us the tools to establish a new state of consciousness and dimension our life experience at a creative and productive level in all our relationships. Transforming suffering into knowledge, weakness into strength, transforming traumas and frustrations into creative processes generates physical, emotional, mental and energetic sustainability over time. We want to find a healthy frequency and re-connect the dream, the vision and the mission of our life.
This Retreat is very appropriate for people who are transcending ADDICTIONS, EMOTIONAL CRISIS or simply want to deepen their path, find more tools and experiences that broaden their LIFE PRACTICE.
The Path of the Warrior takes place in the Holistic Village El Territorio in the mountains of Ginebra, Valle del Cauca, Colombia.
The Territory is a conscious community that promotes community life, care for the environment, social and human development with global awareness, nurturing and exchanging ancestral knowledge and practices that inspire and strengthen our human experience.

El inipi hace referencia a un ritual de purificación, el más importante para la tradición Lakota. En la ceremonia, los asistentes tienen la oportunidad de encontrarse consigo mismos a través del calor, la oscuridad y los cánticos sagrados indígenas.
El Inipi es una ceremonia en la cual no cobramos una remuneración económica, ya que se brinda como un servicio a todos los miembros de la comunidad constantemente . La participación en el Inipi es de forma voluntaria.
The inipi refers to a purification ritual, the most important for the Lakota tradition. In the ceremony, attendees have the opportunity to find themselves through heat, darkness and sacred indigenous songs.
The Inipi is a ceremony in which we do not charge an economic remuneration, since it is constantly provided as a service to all members of the community. Participation in the Inipi is voluntary.
La medicina KAMBÔ es la secreción de una rana arborifera cuyo nombre científico es “Phyllomedusa bicolor”. El KAMBÔ es una medicina que desintoxica el organismo a través de una purga, expulsando todas las toxinas que hacen que el cuerpo pierda su funcionalidad natural. Con esto el cuerpo recupera su vitalidad y funcionalidad, trayendo el bienestar a la persona.
Aplicación:
La medicina KAMBÔ es un tratamiento por lo cual se recomienda 3 aplicaciones en menos de 28 días. El proceso de purga no dura más de 15 min aprox. Una vez terminada la sesión la persona puede seguir normalmente con su día.
Beneficios:
Con Medicina Kambô existe la oportunidad de despertar el cuerpo en su potencia natural. Las personas que reciben regularmente esta “vacuna” no se enferman y tienen mucha energía. Restableciendo el equilibrio natural se evita la aparición de dolencias inducidas por diferentes virus. Incluso el cáncer no tiene la oportunidad de crecer, en algunos casos.
Ocurren cambios en los campos físicos, energético, espiritual y emocional del paciente, la sensación es de limpieza, liviandad, tranquilidad, bienestar, paz interior y profundización de la conciencia.
KAMBÔ medicine is the secretion of a tree frog whose scientific name is “Phyllomedusa bicolor”. KAMBÔ is a medicine that detoxifies the body through a purge, expelling all the toxins that make the body lose its natural functionality. With this, the body recovers its vitality and functionality, bringing well-being to the person.
Application:
KAMBÔ medicine is a treatment for which 3 applications in less than 28 days are recommended. The purging process does not last more than 15 min approx. Once the session is over, the person can continue with their day normally.
Benefits:
With Medicina Kambô there is the opportunity to awaken the body to its natural power. People who regularly receive this “vaccine” do not get sick and have a lot of energy. Restoring the natural balance prevents the appearance of ailments induced by different viruses. Even cancer doesn’t get a chance to grow, in some cases.
Changes occur in the physical, energetic, spiritual and emotional fields of the patient, the sensation is of cleanliness, lightness, tranquility, well-being, inner peace and deepening of consciousness.
La calistenia es un sistema de ejercicios físicos con el propio peso corporal. En este sistema, el interés está en los movimientos de las cadenas musculares que componen nuestro cuerpo.
El objetivo es la adquisición de fuerza, resistencia, agilidad, equilibrio, coordinación y flexibilidad a través de un entrenamiento con el propio peso corporal.
La calistenia es un sistema de ejercicios físicos con el propio peso corporal. En este sistema, el interés está en los movimientos de las cadenas musculares que componen nuestro cuerpo.
El objetivo es la adquisición de fuerza, resistencia, agilidad, equilibrio, coordinación y flexibilidad a través de un entrenamiento con el propio peso corporal.
Las Artes Marciales cultivan el cuerpo, la mente y el espíritu a través de la autodisciplina y el entrenamiento físico, generando hábitos y estilos de vida saludable con un enfoque de ética e integridad y desarrollando un trabajo tanto interno como externo. Las técnicas incluyen: trabajo técnico-táctico en Taekwondo, Tao Do, Hapkido, Defensa Personal, Gimnasia, y Senderismo.
Martial Arts cultivate the body, mind and spirit through self-discipline and physical training, generating habits and healthy lifestyles with a focus on ethics and integrity and developing both internal and external work. The techniques include: technical-tactical work in Taekwondo, Tao Do, Hapkido, Self Defense, Gymnastics, and Hiking.
La alimentación ayurvédica, propia de la medicina tradicional India, se basa en que cada persona escoge los alimentos más adecuados para ella. Tendrás una asesoría personalizada para determinar tu Dosha y plan de alimentación apropiado para ti.
Ayurvedic nutrition, typical of traditional Indian medicine, is based on each person choosing the most suitable foods for them. You will have a personalized advice to determine your Dosha and appropriate eating plan for you.
San Vicente Reserva Termal es un lugar inolvidable en medio de la naturaleza con sus aguas termales en pleno bosque húmedo y la exuberante belleza de toda la flora y fauna que tienen las montañas de los Andes Colombianos.
Disfrutarás de la Zona Termal, las cabinas de vapor y el único rio termal caliente de Latinoamérica.
San Vicente Thermal Reserve is an unforgettable place in the middle of nature with its hot springs in the middle of the humid forest and the exuberant beauty of all the flora and fauna that the mountains of the Colombian Andes have.
You will enjoy the Thermal Zone, the steam cabins and the only hot thermal river in Latin America.
El baño de vapor proporciona una relajación física y mental y alivian la tensión respiratoria. Las hierbas secas o aceites esenciales a un baño de vapor mejora estos beneficios de salud.
Los baños de vapor son parte de un régimen de desintoxicación natural. El vapor provoca que el cuerpo sude y expulse toxinas, lo que es benéfico para el hígado.
The steam bath provides physical and mental relaxation and relieves respiratory tension. Adding dried herbs or essential oils to a steam bath enhances these health benefits.
Steam baths are part of a natural detox regimen. The steam causes the body to sweat and expel toxins, which is beneficial for the liver.
Las plantas maestras son medicinas ancestrales con la fuerza, la tecnología y la información necesarias para ayudarnos a reorganizar nuestros cuerpos físico, mental y energético; tener una experiencia de conexión consciente con la vida.
De acuerdo al momento y al proceso con el grupo compartimos ceremonias con Yage, Wachuma, Yê Muru o Abênury.
The master plants are ancient medicines with the necessary strength, technology and information to help us reorganize our physical, mental and energetic bodies; have an experience of conscious connection with life.
According to the moment and the process with the group, we share ceremonies with Yage, Wachuma, Yê Muru or Abênury.
